name: Super Squirrel
description:
A game made for a gamejam organized by the students of the masters program in game studies and engineering, at the University of Klagenfurt. The theme was decay.

The game is a platformer where you play as a squirrel who has to make it to his tree, but each time you manage to do so, it gets harder as your abilities decay.

Art made by Ansimuz (website)
